sentences.en: A nun's life runs in a groove.
And somewhere out there is a young lady, who I think will never be a nun.
sentences.cn: 在外面有个年轻的女郎,我想, 她将永远不会做修女了.

sentences.en: Finally, late in life and against considerable odds, she became a nun.
sentences.cn: 她排除极大困难，最终在晚年成为了一名修女。

sentences.en: I can't believe that the famous singer has become a nun.
sentences.cn: 我无法相信那个著名的歌星已做了修女.

sentences.en: In a surprising denouement, she becomes a nun.
sentences.cn: 结局出人意表, 她当修女了.

sentences.en: In June 1920 , Mathilde received a letter from a nun.
It has confirmed me in my decision not to become a nun.
sentences.cn: 这使我更加坚定了不做修女的决心。

sentences.en: Mother Teresa is an elderly nun who has devoted her life to fighting poverty.
sentences.cn: 德肋撒嬷嬷是一位毕生致力于消除贫困事业的年迈修女。

sentences.en: Mr. Thomas was taught by the Catholic nuns whose school he attended to work and study hard.
sentences.cn: 托马斯先生受教于天主教修女。在修女开办的学校里他专心工作，刻苦学习。

sentences.en: Nun: Can you imagine that pain all over your body?
sentences.cn: 修女: 你能想象全身都是那么疼 吗 ?

sentences.en: Of the tribe of Ephraim, Oshea the son of Nun.
sentences.cn: 8属以法莲支派的有嫩的儿子何希阿.

sentences.en: Old nun asks the child, you why jump the queue?
sentences.cn: 老修女问孩子, 你为什么插队 呢 ?

sentences.en: She became a nun and cared for the terminally ill for the rest of her life.
sentences.cn: 她做了修女，用她的余生照顾患有绝症的人们。

sentences.en: She shaved her head and became a nun.

sentences.cn: 那位修女立下严格的誓愿.

sentences.en: The old nun was as imperious as ever , but visibly thawed when she saw the children.
sentences.cn: 老修女仍然像从前一样专橫,看到孩子们时却显得温和多了.

trans.tran_en: someone who is a member of a group of religious women that live together in a convent
